description: A lawless pirate town on Jaya Island where pirates gather, known for attracting rough and cynical pirates who have given up on their dreams. The town features various bars and establishments where pirates drink and mock those with grand ambitions.

keyEvents.title: Bellamy Finishes Beating Luffy and Zoro
keyEvents.description: The beating of Luffy and Zoro by Bellamy's crew concludes in the bar, with the bar patrons mocking them.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the cynical atmosphere of Mock Town where dreamers are ridiculed.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard's Dreams Speech
keyEvents.description: Outside the bar, Marshall D. Teach delivers his iconic speech about dreams never ending to Luffy and Zoro.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most memorable moments in One Piece history takes place on the streets of Mock Town.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Leave Mock Town
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew departs from Mock Town to search for Mont Blanc Cricket.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Mock Town segment of the Jaya Arc.

description: The ocean waters surrounding Jaya Island where salvage operations take place. The Saruyama Alliance conducts underwater exploration and salvage work in these waters, searching for treasures and artifacts from the ocean floor.

keyEvents.title: Shoujou's First Appearance
keyEvents.description: Shoujou appears in the waters around Jaya with his ship, conducting sonar-based salvage operations.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the location where the Saruyama Alliance operates and searches the ocean floor.

keyEvents.title: Shoujou Attacks the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: The battle between Shoujou and the Straw Hats takes place in the waters around Jaya.
keyEvents.significance: Site of the confrontation that will eventually lead to the alliance between the Straw Hats and Saruyama Alliance.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel given to them by Kaya. The ship serves as their home and base of operations as they sail through the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Robin Shares Information
keyEvents.description: Aboard the Going Merry, Robin reveals information about Mont Blanc Cricket to the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the meeting place where the crew plans their next move toward Sky Island.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Survives Shoujou's Attack
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry endures Shoujou's sonic attack with minimal damage compared to his own ship.
keyEvents.significance: The ship proves resilient against the powerful sonic assault.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the Straw Hat Pirates' ship
